languages.text: "Ответ отрицательный. Я не наблюдаю здесь своих собратьев — только их биологически функционирующие останки, собранные в образец противоестественного искажения Технологии. Я не имею директивы испытывать почтения к подобным образцам".

"Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."
languages.original_text: "Ответ отрицательный. Я не наблюдаю здесь своих собратьев — только их биологически функционирующие останки, собранные в образец противоестественного искажения Технологии. Я не имею директивы испытывать почтения к подобным образцам".

traits.locale_text: "Negative. What I am currently observing is not my brethren, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

"Negative. What I am currently observing is not my brethren, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

"Negative. What I am currently observing is not my brethren, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

"Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

languages.text: “并没有。我目前观察的并不是我的技术伙伴，只不过是由他们的生物性功能残骸，通过邪恶技术重组而成的非自然标本。我并没有收到任何指令，需要我对这种标本怀有亲近感。”
languages.original_text: "Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

traits.locale_text: “并没有。我目前观察的并不是我的弟兄们，只不过是由他们的生物性功能残骸，通过邪恶技术重组而成的非自然标本。我并没有收到任何指令，需要我对这种标本怀有亲近感。”

languages.text: «Negativo. Lo que veo ahora mismo no son mis tecnocamaradas, sino sus restos biológicamente activos reconvertidos en un espécimen perverso con tecnología antinatural. No hay ninguna directiva que me incite a sentir la más remota afinidad por estas criaturas».
languages.original_text: "Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

traits.locale_text: «Negativo. Lo que veo ahora mismo no son mis hermanos, sino sus restos biológicamente activos reconvertidos en un espécimen perverso con tecnología antinatural. No hay ninguna directiva que me incite a sentir la más remota afinidad por estas criaturas».

languages.text: 「否定だ。私が現在観察しているのは、私の技術の同志たちではなく、彼らの生物学的に機能する遺骸が、不自然なテクノロジーの倒錯の標本に加工されたものにすぎない。私はそのような標本に親近感を抱くよう指示されてはいない」
languages.original_text: "Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

traits.locale_text: 「否定だ。私が現在観察しているのは、私の兄弟たちではなく、彼らの生物学的に機能する遺骸が、不自然なテクノロジーの倒錯の標本に加工されたものにすぎない。私はそのような標本に親近感を抱くよう指示されてはいない」

languages.text: "Negativ. Was ich aktuell beobachte, sind nicht meine Techkameraden, sondern lediglich ihre biologisch intakten Überreste, die zu einem Exemplar einer unnatürlichen Pervertierung von Technologie gemacht wurden. Ich habe keine Direktiven, irgendetwas für derlei Exemplare zu empfinden."
languages.original_text: "Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

traits.locale_text: "Negativ. Was ich aktuell beobachte, sind nicht meine Brüder, sondern lediglich ihre biologisch intakten Überreste, die zu einem Exemplar einer unnatürlichen Pervertierung von Technologie gemacht wurden. Ich habe keine Direktiven, irgendetwas für derlei Exemplare zu empfinden."

languages.text: « Négatif. Ce ne sont pas mes technoconfrères que j'observe, simplement leurs enveloppes corporelles biologiquement vivantes qui ont servi à créer un spécimen de perversion technologique. Je n'ai pas reçu d'instruction me demandant de ressentir de l'affinité pour une telle créature. »
languages.original_text: "Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

traits.locale_text: « Négatif. Ce ne sont pas mes frères que j'observe, simplement leurs enveloppes corporelles biologiquement vivantes qui ont servi à créer un spécimen de perversion technologique. Je n'ai pas reçu d'instruction me demandant de ressentir de l'affinité pour une telle créature. »

languages.text: "Olumsuz. Şu an gözlemlediklerim, benim tekno yoldaşlarım değildir. Ancak biyolojik işlevlerini yürütebilen kalıntılarının, gayritabii bir Teknoloji sapkınlığının ürününe dönüştürülmüş hâlleri olabilirler. Bunlar için his sahibi olmak yönünde bir talimata tabi değilim."
languages.original_text: "Negative. What I am currently observing is not my tech-comrades, but merely their biologically functioning remains fashioned into a specimen of an unnatural perversion of Technology. I am under no directives to feel any affinity for such specimens."

traits.locale_text: “Olumsuz. Şu an gözlemlediklerim, benim tekno yoldaşlarım değildir. Ancak biyolojik işlevlerini yürütebilen kalıntılarının, gayritabii bir Teknoloji sapkınlığının ürününe dönüştürülmüş hâlleri olabilirler. Bunlar için his sahibi olmak yönünde bir talimata tabi değilim.”
